title: Interpretation of a dream about a husband flying a plane in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of a husband flying a plane in a dream. We may search for an interpretation of a dream of a husband flying a plane in a dream from dreams that make the dreamer feel very anxious, but he wants to know an interpretation of Interfere with interpretations, but they convey the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of a dream of a husband flying a plane in a dream: seeing a husband driving An airplane in a dream may indicate some disagreements and problems that exist between them, and God knows best. If a woman sees that her husband is flying the pilot during departure, this may indicate positive changes in her life during these days. It is possible that this vision is an indication of the imminent imposition and extensive maintenance that can For the husband to obtain it by the grace of God. A dream about riding a plane in a dream indicates happiness and abundance of sustenance that the dreamer will obtain, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about eating fish for the husband in a dream: Eating fish in a dream may indicate the extensive diet that the husband may obtain during this period. In the event that A woman saw that her husband was eating fish, this may indicate positive changes that occurred in his life during this period. Seeing him eating fish in a dream may indicate happy events that the husband may receive in the coming days. If a person sees himself eating fish in a dream, this may indicate That is because he is afflicted with a disease, then he gets rid of it at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a husband running on green land in a dream: Seeing the wife working on green land may mean that she will get a lot of money in those days. Who dreams that the husband was running on green land It may indicate great wealth that he can acquire after the poverty he suffered from. Dreaming of a husband running on green land in a dream may indicate repentance for the sins and disobedience that the husband committed, and God knows best. When you see your wife lying on green land in a dream, this may indicate Positive changes will occur in your life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a husband eating his wife’s meat in a dream: A husband eating his wife’s meat in a dream may indicate that he will obtain a lot of halal money during this period. Eating his wife’s meat in a dream could indicate the arrival To power or promotion at work during this time, and God knows best. If one sees a husband eating his wife’s meat in a dream, this may indicate many changes that occur in those days, thanks to God. Seeing a husband eating his wife’s meat in a dream may indicate that she A woman of good character and appearance, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about a husband drinking milk in a dream: In the event that you see a husband eating milk in a dream, this may indicate that he is a person who helps others a lot in their lives. Dreaming that a husband eats milk in a dream may indicate the coming goodness of the marriage with the grace of God. Whoever sees in her dream that her husband was drinking milk, it may indicate that she will get rid of the worries and problems that she has suffered from for a long time. Perhaps seeing the husband eating milk in the dream indicates positive changes that will occur in his life during that period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a husband’s period In a dream, a dream can indicate

title: Interpretation of a toilet in a dream

preview.html: We get to know you in detail about the interpretation of a toilet in a dream. Dreams are always known for their mystery and for carrying many secrets among their events. Some people believe that dreams are only inner libations of self-expression and fulfillment of frozen hopes, aspirations and desires that may be difficult to achieve in reality, and others believe that dreams are nothing but matters in which a person exhausts himself. Constant thought, so they appeared to him among the events of his dreams. However, what is important for many is to know the interpretation of the situations and events of these dreams and to know what they reflect in reality, is it good or bad, so today we present to you the interpretation of seeing a toilet in a dream by the Islamic translator Muhammad Ibn Sirin From the Encyclopedia website.Interpretation of a toilet in a dream. The meaning of seeing a toilet in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The Islamic translator Ibn Sirin attributed seeing a toilet in a dreamer’s dream to indicate reprehensible things such as sins and taboos. It also indicates a person’s bad vision, just like someone who was married and saw himself entering the bathroom with him. He may cheat on or flirt with a woman other than his wife. A woman who is known for being corrupt is not permissible in this world. Seeing an abandoned or damaged toilet in a dream means anxiety, sadness, and distress for the dreamer. It can also indicate the presence of a long road and an exhausting journey that the dreamer must travel, but he will find comfort and happiness in the end, God willing. Also, entering the toilet indicates the imminent approach of pains, worries, and aches, and the dreamer’s recovery from his illness, and it is known that the toilet or toilet It is the house of comfort in which a person finds comfort and salvation from all this. Waste and toxins were found in his body. As for the vision of entering the toilet to shower, it is an indication that the dreamer will be cleansed of disobedience and sins, and that he desires to follow the path of repentance and do good deeds that will bring him closer to God. To God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about a clean toilet. Seeing a clean toilet in a dream means the arrival of happy news and good news about goodness and joy in a person’s life. And when a person sees in his dream that he is entering a clean toilet, this is a sign that God Almighty will give him peace of mind and release his worries. Interpretation of a dream Toilet: Dreaming about a dirty toilet is disturbing. Anyone who dreams of a dirty toilet full of insects and filth has a friendship with a man who commits many sins and disobedience. Also, seeing a dirty toilet in a dream is an indication that one has a bad reputation and is outcast among people, so one should stay away from committing sins and walking in the same way. The path of guidance and direction. If a person sees himself entering a dirty and unclean toilet, this may indicate that he is cheating and deceiving his partner. Interpretation of a dream about a toilet overflow in a dream. Ibn Sirin said that seeing a toilet in a dream in a dream is reprehensible, as it indicates the arrival of many unpleasant news, It also indicates the presence of many disagreements and problems in the dreamer’s life. Seeing a toilet in a dream for a married woman. A married woman seeing a toilet in her dream indicates that her tongue is not safe from slander, gossip, and committing sinful acts. Also, seeing a toilet in her dream indicates that her tongue is not safe from slander, gossip, and committing sinful acts.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a black scorpion by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a black scorpion Scorpions are poisonous and harmful creatures, and seeing them in a dream causes concern for many people, but they carry many meanings and associations, such as those that express goodness, good news and happy news, and others that bring nothing but trouble, worries and negativity. Events in a dream of events, we will provide all the details related to this topic in the following article. Interpretation of a dream of a black scorpion Interpretation scholars have explained many meanings and connotations associated with seeing a black scorpion in a dream, which are as follows: If a person sees a black scorpion in his dream, this is a clear indication of fear of the future, a gloomy outlook on life and an inability to live in peace, which leads to control of psychological pressure and sadness. If a student sees a black scorpion in his dream, this is evidence of his inability to study his lessons, his failure in exams and his failure in the educational aspect. Whoever sees black scorpions in a dream, this is a sign of his bad behavior and his misguidance in the honor of people and that he speaks falsely about them, and he must repent to God before it is too late. Interpretation of a dream about a black scorpion on a person’s leg in his dream symbolizes the corruption of his life, committing immorality, and walking in crooked paths, and he must return to God so that he is not destined for hell. If the dreamer sees a black scorpion in a dream, this is a sign that he earns his money from polluted and dubious sources. If a person dreams that many black scorpions come out of His clothes, this is a clear indication that he is surrounded by toxic characters who are plotting against him and trying to harm him. Interpretation of the dream of the black scorpion by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin explained many signs and symbols related to seeing a black scorpion in a dream, the most important of which are the following: If a person sees in his dream that he is killing a black scorpion, he will be able to overcome the obstacles and experiences that prevented him from his happiness and disturbed his sleep in the very near future. If the dreamer sees the black scorpion behind him in his dream, he will receive unpleasant news, and he will be surrounded by negative events from every direction, which will lead him to enter a spiral of sadness. Interpretation of the dream of the black scorpion for a single woman The single woman’s vision of the black scorpion in a dream has many interpretations and meanings, the most important of which are the following: If the dreamer is single and sees black scorpions in her dream, this is clear evidence of the presence of a malicious person near her who pretends to love her and is waiting for the right opportunity to harm her, so she must be careful. If a girl who has never been married sees a scorpion in her dream, this is a sign that her haters and haters will mention her Badly to distort her image. Interpretation of a dream about dead black scorpions in a dream for a girl who is not a relative leads to alleviating circumstances and changing them from the worst to the best in the coming period. If a virgin sees in her dream a black scorpion chasing her, but she was able to overcome it, kill it and get rid of it, this is a clear indication of her ability to confront opponents and triumph over them, which leads her to a feeling of happiness and security. What does it mean to see a black scorpion in a dream?

title: Interpretation of the legal point of view in the dream, secrets of the legal interpretation of the dream of shufa

preview.html: “Oh chiefs, give me a fatwa in my dream, if you have a vision.” Learn about the interpretation of the legal point of view in a dream for pregnant, single, married, divorced women. In this article, in the article, servants of God are divided into real single men. And about the self - a discussion whose origin is from Satan, and over-thinking about a matter, and no one knows the interpretation of visions except God Almighty and those among whom He divides His servants who know the interpretation of dreams, and here is more about the interpretation of dreams. The legal opinion on a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the legal opinion in a dream by Ibn Sirin Sirin Ibn Sirin is one of the most important imams of interpretation of dreams and visions, and among the dreams he interpreted was the dream of seeing the legal view in a dream, and his interpretation was as follows: If a man sees in his dream the legal view of a married woman. This indicates his attempt to enjoy life and achieve happiness with the failure of these attempts. If a person sees the view of Sharia law in his dream. This indicates that the person has good faith and good intentions. If a person sees the legitimate look in his dream on Friday, this indicates that he will receive many blessings, sustenance, and goodness from God Almighty, other than a good marriage and the happiness that comes from it. Interpretation of a dream about a legitimate sofaIf a man sees in a dream That he casts a legitimate look at a beautiful girl with a good face, this indicates that he will be blessed with an abundance of goodness, blessing in his life, and provision from God Almighty. It also indicates that the fortuneteller sees in the legitimate appearance of a girl with good features, and there is an exchange of feelings between them. This indicates that many pleasant, happy and lucky things will come soon. I dreamed about my legal view Seeing a legal view in a dream means that many long-awaited happy things will happen, either emotionally or in terms of work. Seeing a legal view in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s desire In marriage.If a single man sees in his dream the legal point of view. This indicates his desire to marry a certain girl. It also shows that they will get married soon. Legal interpretation of a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream, a young man proposes to her. This is one of the praiseworthy visions. It indicates that the girl is approaching good and happy news, and happiness is approaching for her. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is rejecting the young man who marries her in the dream. This indicates that she will get engaged soon. Which will have the greatest impact on happiness for her and her family. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream the legal point of view. This indicates that there are not a few people who propose to marry her, despite her constant rejection. Also, seeing the legal opinion in an unmarried woman’s dream also indicates a person’s desire to marry her, for fear of her rejection. Also, seeing the progress of the plan in The dream of an unmarried woman indicates the presence of a young man who loves this girl and wants to propose to her. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream, the legal point of view. This shows that she wants to be associated with a good person and that she thinks about it a lot

title: Interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection and fear by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Dreaming about the Day of Resurrection and its horrors is one of the most difficult and disturbing dreams, and therefore many people seek to interpret the dream of the Day of Resurrection and fear. In a dream, this dream is a good sign or warning of danger, and we will discuss this in detail in this article on the encyclopedia website, because the Day of Resurrection is full of terror and there are many signs that indicate On its proximity and if these signs appear in your dream, it will certainly have a meaning and purpose. What, and the interpretation of the dream varies depending on the state of sleep, and this we will explain. Interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection and fearDreams are a mysterious world, whose dimensions no one knows completely, and therefore it always arouses the curiosity of many and everyone wants Knowing the meaning of the presence of some objects in a dream. Each symbol has its own meaning and interpretations vary depending on the condition of the sleeper, so there are many different theories about interpretations. If the dreamer is a man, the interpretation of the dream will, of course, be different if the dreamer is a woman, and so on. Psychologists believe that a person's social, psychological and professional status greatly affects a person's dreams. Dreams are only an expression of what is happening in the subconscious mind, so everything a person dreams about is what he desires to achieve or fears, etc. It must be emphasized that the interpretation of dreams A science that is basically based on speculation and conjecture, and therefore right and wrong are possible, and the dreamer should not completely trust the interpretation of his dream, because this interpretation is nothing but jurisprudence. From the scholars. All destiny is in the hands of God, and no one knows the unseen except He, the Almighty. Therefore, the Muslim must take the reasons, rely on God, and not leave his mind to myths that neither advance nor delay. It is one of the matters that most preoccupies Muslims on the Day of Resurrection, as the Day of Resurrection is a great day that was mentioned many times in the Holy Qur’an. Interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection and the fear of The point of view of leading scholars in interpreting dreams is that the dreamer is afraid of God Almighty and fear of judgment. The dream also shows the intensity of the dreamer’s faith because he wants to obtain the approval of Almighty God so that he can be among those who succeed on this great day and have a place in Paradise. It is possible that fear In the dream, it symbolizes for the dreamer that he is committing a sin and is deeply afraid of God’s punishment for him, and this dream comes as a warning to him, until he repents and returns to God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about signs of the Day of Resurrection. It has been indicated in our true Islamic religion that there are many signs and signs that will strike the earth and warn of the imminent appearance of the Day of Resurrection. Among the most famous signs of the Hour is that the nation will give birth to its mistress, and naked, barefoot shepherds will rise, and visits to a building, and the appearance of thirty magicians and charlatans claiming prophecy, and the appearance of the Antichrist. The descent of Jesus, son of Mary, the appearance of Gog and Magog, the appearance of a man-eating animal, the spread of smoke, the sunrise from The West, the appearance of an eclipse in the East and the eclipse in the East, the eclipse in the Arabian Peninsula, and the appearance of fire as we emerge from Yemen leading people to gather, and other signs. The appearance of such signs in a dream causes extreme fear and anxiety to the dreamer, and thus increases his determination to know the meaning of this sign.

title: Interpretation of dreams of my husband's brother kissing me on the mouth in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams for my husband's brother kissing me on the mouth in the interpretation of the dream are most likely the bearers of the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of dreams for my husband's brother kissing me on the mouth in a dream. preview.html: Seeing a woman's severed hand in a dream indicates the cessation of the menstrual cycle, and seeing a short hand in a dream indicates stinginess, poverty and humiliation in the dreamer's life. Interpretation of seeing a hand held in a dream about a single girl If a single woman sees in a dream that she is holding the hand of a person she has never seen before in her life in a dream. It announces that she will face a new issue in her life and will be happy with it, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream a person she knows well in her life, and he was holding her hand tightly in a dream. It shows that someone close to this single girl will try to control her life and force her to do things. And the dreaming girl who sees in a dream that she is holding someone's hand and she is very happy in the dream. It indicates that this single girl will marry someone who loves her in life and helps her, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. If you see a single girl in a dream, that person who admires her, holds her hands in a dream, and she is happy. This is a clear indication that this single girl will marry a righteous man who loves her very much in her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream of someone you love holding your hand for singles, married people and men Interpretation of seeing a hand held in A dream for a married woman If a married woman sees in a dream that a person she did not know before is holding her hands in a dream and she was happy with him. The interpretation indicates the great support from her close friends in her life at this time and that she will be happy. A married woman dreams that her husband dreams of her hands and shakes them. Here it indicates the fear that this married woman sees in her life and that her husband is trying to stay with her in this matter. If a married woman looks at two people holding hands in a dream, and she was sad in the dream. This is an indication that this married woman is trying to find someone to support her in her life and God knows best. A married woman is a dreamer looking for someone who knows how to hold hands in a dream. This indicates that during this period she will be exposed to a great disappointment in her life. Interpretation of seeing a hand held in a dream for a divorced woman If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is holding someone's hand in a dream and she has not known him before in her life. It announces that she will get close to someone and love him during this period of her time and be happy with him, God willing. And the divorced dreamer who is looking in a dream for someone to hold her hands in a dream and did not find him. This is an indication of That her marriage has been long overdue, and that she will live in distress at this time, and God knows best. Likewise, a divorced woman who dreams that she is holding someone's hand in a dream and is happy with him in the dream. This is an indication that she will marry someone in her life during this time and will live happily with him. Seeing a divorced woman in a dream holding her hand and that she is in dire need of this subject in a dream. This indicates that she feels very lonely and that she feels lonely in many of the things she does. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about carrying the Qur’an in the hand Interpretation of seeing a hand held in a dream about a man and its meaning If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is holding someone's hand near him in a dream, and he is happy with his closeness in the dream. Here it indicates that this situation

title: Interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing sweets: Ibn Sirin believes that seeing sweets in a dream indicates the arrival of kindness, abundance of food, and abundance of money to the dreamer. If anyone sees this eating a lot of sweets in a dream, this means that the dreamer will face health problems. Then seeing a young man eating sweets in a dream means that he will achieve a lot of happiness. Profits and profits from his business. Ibn Sirin indicated that seeing a sleeper giving sweets to someone in a dream means that the dreamer will get married soon, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that if a dream sees an unmarried woman buying sweets, then you will hear good news in the coming period. God willing. Then see a free girl. If she eats sweets in her dream, it means that she will achieve great success in her life in the near future. If she eats a large amount of sweets, then this vision shows the positive changes that will occur in her life. If she eats sweets, she is sad because this vision is unpleasant It symbolizes feelings of despair, disappointment, and frustration. Interpretation of receiving sweets in a dream: The sleeper who receives sweets in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer will achieve all of his goals that he was trying to achieve. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is taking candy from someone, this means that she will soon be involved in something From God. Then see a pregnant woman. She takes sweets from someone she knows, and that she will soon give birth to a child, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer is a married man, then this dream indicates marital happiness and family stability that he will obtain. Interpretation of a dream about the dead giving sweetsIf the dreamer sees that the dead give him Candy in a dream, it means that the dreamer will get a lot of money. It could be inheritance. Hence, seeing a dead person eating sweet meat in a dreamer’s dream indicates the distinguished position that the fortuneteller will reach, and God knows best. They symbolize watching a dead person eating sweets in the sad dreamer’s dream that his life will change for the better, God willing. I am watching under the protection of God Eating sweets in a dream means the arrival of kindness, abundant food, and abundant money to the dreamer. Distributing sweets in a dream to a married woman. See the point Married / Married If she distributes sweets in her dream, she will get a lot of money in her field of work. If a woman sees sweets in a dream, this dream indicates the end of disputes And marital problems, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Seeing delicious sweets in a married woman’s dream symbolizes the prosperity and happiness that the dreamer will have in her life. Seeing a married woman preparing sweets in a dream means that she will hear good news in the coming season, God willing. Buying sweets in a dream If one sees that he is buying Candy in a dream, this indicates joys and happy occasions and good luck to you. Then the dreamer sees that buying candy shows in the dream that he is turning away from his Lord and not performing his duties, and God is the Most High, the All-Knowing. This vision in a man’s dream may indicate that he is a lustful person who wants to indulge in his whims and pleasures and give up About his religion. So the vision of buying sweets

title: Interpretation of a dream about a wide eyebrow according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about a wide eyebrow in a dream is presented to you through the Encyclopedia website. Interpretation of dreams has become one of the things that preoccupies everyone’s mind, and they constantly search for an interpretation of their dream and go to more than one person to interpret it. Which he saw in a dream. Questions about the interpretation of dreams are also asked on search engines and communication sites. The matter has become more widespread in a different way than it was before, so everyone was interested in interpreting their visions, knowing that the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, had forbidden the narration of unwanted visions, because they are from Satan and he seeks refuge in God from the accursed Satan, but we will present to you the interpretation of the dream of a wide eyebrow in The dream during the following paragraphs, as the commentators explain, everything that we will discuss is only from their point of view and vision, and we have collected them and present them to you through our website. Interpretation of a dream about a wide eyebrow in a dream. Certainly everyone knows that the interpretation of a vision and a dream differs according to insight for many reasons, the most important of which is that the interpretation of a vision is different for men than for women. Below we present to you some of the most famous interpretations of his dreams. In general, interpretation scholars believe that seeing a wide eyebrow in a dream is a sign of happiness and stability, and that if the dreamer suffers from problems during this period, he will be able to solve them, God willing. Seeing a thick eyebrow is a sign of Obtaining a better job opportunity and starting a new project and that the person will be able to succeed in his work and life and earn a lot of halal money. If one sees a dream in which his eyebrows fall, this is one of the unfavorable visions, indicating the loss of a loved one or exposure to trouble, and a feeling of anxiety and sadness. And fear for the future. If the eyebrows are thick and connected to each other and the dreamer has problems with his family and family, this is a sign that the problems will end and that his life will soon stabilize. Interpretation of a dream about a wide eyebrow in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation scholars interpreted that the girl saw her eyebrows beautifully, but they fell and appeared In their place are thick, chaotic eyebrows. If the girl is engaged, this is a sign that this engagement will end and that she will suffer failure in her love life. Some interpretive scholars believe that if a girl sees that her eyebrows are thick while cleaning and plucking them until they are devoid of eyebrows, this indicates that she A rebellious girl who doesn't accept reality easily, and she's strong enough to try. Achieving her goals. Seeing a girl using tweezers to trim her wide eyebrows, but completely changing the shape of her eyebrows, shows that there are many wrong beliefs that she believes in and she needs to change those beliefs and get closer to God. Interpretation of a dream about a wide eyebrow in a dream for a married woman. And for a married woman to see her eyebrows, which are In fact, they were thick, as this is evidence that her offspring will be righteous and close to God, as this is evidence of the goodness that will come to her. A thick eyebrow in a dream for a married woman in general is one of the praiseworthy visions that always symbolize goodness, changing the situation for the better, getting rid of problems, and obtaining offspring. Good

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about rats from Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq, the interpretation of a dream about mice in the house, and the interpretation of a dream about eating mice in a dream.

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about mice: Mice are considered rodents that one fears seeing or approaching in reality, because they transmit strong diseases and work to spread dangerous epidemics in addition to biting, and if the dreamer finds them, he becomes sad and upset and expects negativity. The effect will be great for him in wakefulness, so what is the meaning of seeing rats, we will explain it in our article. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about rats? Seeing rats is one of the difficult visions for the dreamer, because the interpretations that came to it are not good at all, but in general they can alert him Of many things that bother him and cause him many worries, such as magic and hostility. And bad words and more. Experts expect that seeing many mice in a dream portends evil for a man, because it could be evidence of some women who are committing sins and those close to him. But if a mouse chases you without harming you within sight, it is expected that you will live a healthy and beautiful life, In addition to the long and abundant goodness in it. There is a group of experts in interpretation, led by Ibn Shaheen, who believe that a mouse in a dream is not bad at all, because it means an abundance of goodness and the appearance of sustenance. But if you find a small mouse inside your house and chase it, this means that it is among Your children are children who are difficult to raise, in addition to the many problems they bring to you. Therefore, we see the great diversity of interpretations related to this vision: some see it as an indication of many sins and the transmission of many sins, while others say that it is good according to the opinion of each interpreter. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream in a dream: Warning Ibn Sirin: Whoever sees a rat in his dream means that there is a corrupt person in his life who is trying to spoil many of his affairs and increase his sadness and misery. The person may be exposed to an attempt to rob him after seeing rats in his dream, and therefore he must believe and protect himself from the evil that is likely to surround him. He sees In general, this dream is one of the clear indications of the wrong and evil actions that the dreamer does to some people, and it advises him to get closer to God and his imminent repentance. It says that your attempt to get rid of the mouse and kill it in the dream despite your success in it is a sign of the blessing of life and closeness to distinction and superiority. And victory over enemies. If a man sees a large rat in his dream, it is a corrupt, polluted, and disreputable woman, and he must deal with this woman so that his problems do not increase. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, Google is the dream interpretation site in Egypt. Interpretation of a dream about rats by Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq joins the group of experts Whoever sees evil mice in a dream, says that it is a sign of a person who has many worries and temptations, and he must escape from them. If one sees many mice chasing him in a dream, he will be surrounded by many difficult things, such as evil friends and gloomy events, in addition to losing psychological stability. As for seeing a large rat trying to bite, this is a sign that you are resorting to forbidden money and seeking to bring it through corruption and forbidden things and not fearing God in this.
